title: Adani Power arm amalgamates Stratatech Mineral Resources
description: Adani Power Ltd's arm Mahan Energen Ltd approved merging Stratatech Mineral Resources with Dhirauli Coal Mine to enhance fuel security, subject to shareholder and regulatory approvals, with a peak-rated capacity of 6.5 million tonnes per annum. The merger involves a wholly-owned subsidiary engaged in mining, power generation, and allied activities.
